name: Lawful Basis
definition: Legal ground required to lawfully process personal data

name: Consent
definition: Freely given, specific, informed voluntary indication of wishes by data subject

name: Contract
definition: Processing necessary for performance of contract with data subject or pre-contract obligations

name: Legal Obligation
definition: Processing necessary to comply with legal obligation applicable to controller

name: Vital Interests
definition: Processing necessary to protect vital interests of data subject or another person

name: Public Task
definition: Processing necessary for performance of task carried out in public interest or official authority

name: Legitimate Interests
definition: Processing necessary for legitimate interests pursued by controller except where overridden by rights of data subject
